title.narrative: Accelerating Renewable Energy Integration and Sustainable Energy

description.narrative: The development objective is to increase renewable energy generation capacity and enhance the financial and environmental sustainability of the power sector in the Maldives.

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

description.narrative: Total Commitment in Fourth Quarter of 2020

condition.narrative: AIIB Joint Co-financing: Co-financing Deadline for the effectiveness of the AIIB Co-financing Agreement is [May 31, 2021], exceptas the Recipient and the Association shall otherwise agree. (IDA Financing Agreement (FA), Section 4.01).

Annual Work Plans and Budgets: The Recipient shall provide its draft no later than October 1, and its final version reflectinginputs provided by the Association no later then December 1 (except for the first year when the legal agreement becomes effectivewhen such dates shall be one and two months after the Effective Date) (IDA FA, Schedule 2, Section II.B; CTF LA, Schedule 2 SectionII.A.2).

Environmental and Social Standards and Performance Standards: The Recipient shall : (i) ensure that the Project is implemented inaccordance with the Environmental and Social Standards and its Environmental and Social Commitment Plan (ESCP), in a manneracceptable to the Association, (ii) cause each of the Investors to ensure, that its Subproject is carried out with due regard toappropriate health, safety, social, and environmental practices and standards, in accordance with the Performance Standards and theEnvironment, Health, and Safety (EHS) Guidelines, in a manner acceptable to the Association, (iii) ensure that funding andcapacities are available to comply with these obligations, (iv) comply with its reporting obligations under the ESCP, and (v)establish and cause each Investor to establish a grievance redress mechanism. (IDA FA, Schedule 2, Section I.C; CTF LA, Schedule 2Section I.C; CTF GA, Schedule 2 Section I.C).

Implementation Arrangement: No later than one (1) month after the Effective Date: the Recipient shall establish the SteeringCommittee (IDA FA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1(a); Clean Technology Fund (CTF) Loan Agreement (LA), Schedule 2 Section I.A.1(a)), theTechnical Committee (IDA FA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1(b); CTF LA, Schedule 2 Section I.A.1(b)) and the Project Management Unit(PMU) (IDA FA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1(c); CTF LA, Schedule 2 Section I.A.1(c)), each with composition and mandate acceptable tothe Association.

Midterm Review: No later than 36 months after the effective date or as agreed with the Association, preceded by the transmission ofa report by the Recipient to the Association at least one month before the review. (IDA FA, Schedule 2, Section II.C; CTF LA,Schedule 2 Section II.A.3).

Project Operations Manual: No later than one (1) month after the Effective Date: the Recipient shall adopt the Project OperationsManual, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. (IDA FA, Schedule 2, Section I.D; CTF LA, Schedule 2 Section I.D).

Subprojects: For the extension of Tariff Buy Down Grants under Part 1.1 of the Project, the Recipient shall in each case enter intoan Implementation Agreement (and/or Tariff Buy Down Grant Agreement) with the Investor, on the basis of the model and in accordancewith the terms and conditions acceptable to the Association and reflected in the Project Operations Manual (IDA FA, Schedule 2,Section I.B).For the capitalization of Secured Payment Mechanism under Part 1.2 of the Project, the Recipient shall in each caseenter into an Implementation Agreement with the Investor and an Escrow Account Agreement with the Investor, the Offtaker and a bankto act as Escrow Agent, on the basis of the model and in accordance with the terms and conditions acceptable to the Association andreflected in the Project Operations Manual (CTF Grant Agreement (GA), Schedule 2, Section I.B).
